description:
The future is unchanged, Black isn’t what Goku had initially thought, and the situation has escalated to something more severe. With this new information, will the Saiyan trio fare better than before?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Zamasu no Yabou: Katarareru Kyoufu no "Ningen 0 Keikaku"
Zamasu`s Ambition: The Awful "Zero Mortal Plan" Is Revealed
Zamasus Plan! – Der Schrecken einer Welt ohne Menschen!
ザマスの野望 語られる恐怖の「人間0計画」
